title: Typeface critique
content:
for some reason i couldn't post this in the critique section.   
   
this is my first attempt at building a typeface. Its based from old Civil War era posters.   
   
 [www.helloproduct.com/fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080937/http:/www.helloproduct.com/fonts)
author: hello_caleb
